basicTranslationDesc: Validate the basic translation functionality of the t() function, including nested key access, array indexing, and default value fallback.

level1.level2: This is a nested translation key

languageSwitcherDesc: Validate the setLocale() method, reactive locale state, availableLocales list, and isLoading state.
languageSwitchError: Failed to switch language, please try again.
parameterInterpolationDesc: Validate the parameter interpolation functionality of t(key, params), supporting various parameter types and special character escaping.
pluralizationDesc: Validate the automatic pluralization functionality of t(key, { count }), automatically selecting the appropriate translation based on plural rules for different languages.
directiveDesc: Validate various usages of the v-t directive, including basic usage, parameter support, HTML mode, and reactive updates.
directiveBasic: This text is rendered via v-t directive
directiveReactiveHint: When switching languages, the text below will auto-update:
translationComponentDesc: Validate various properties and usages of the <Translation> component, including keypath, params, plural, tag, etc.
translationComponentBasic: This is rendered via Translation component
globalPropertiesDesc: Validate the usage of global properties $t, $i18n, and $locale, which are available in both Composition API and Options API.
globalPropertiesOptionsApiMessage: This is a message in Options API component
loadingStatesDesc: Validate isReady and isLoading states, used for conditional rendering and disabling UI.
devtoolsDesc: Validate DevTools statistics, missing key tracking, and export functionality.
devtoolsConsoleHint: Use these commands in browser console
